headline: These Stocks Moved the Most Today: Tesla, Nvidia, Core Scientific, WNS, Netflix, Shell, and More

headline: Airline earnings on deck: Delta, American, and United
summary: Airline stocks are in focus ahead of Delta's (DAL) earnings report. Citi managing director Stephen Trent sits down with Julie Hyman and Explosive Options technical analyst Bob Lang on Market Catalysts to discuss what to expect from Delta earnings as well as American (AAL) and United (UAL). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.

headline: Delta Launched its New DC City Charger E180kW EV Charger at ASEW 2025 to Strengthen E-Mobility Across Southeast Asia
summary: Delta Electronics (Thailand) PCL., a global leader in power management and smart green solutions, introduced its next-generation DC City Charger E180kW at Asia Sustainable Energy Week (ASEW) 2025, reinforcing its leadership in clean mobility and advanced EV infrastructure across Southeast Asia. This newly-launched fast EV charger boasts dual-gun simultaneous charging, up to 94% energy efficiency, and hot-swappable power modules for quick maintenance and high availability.
